result.execSummary:
The defendant Derek J. Gustason was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Polk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Subject to good time and work release.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to COCC within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay will be a judgment.
$250.00 DNA surcharge to the COCC within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay will be a judgment.
Must complete an AODA assessment if required and comply with recommendations.

No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.

Must follow conditions of supervision.
Must provide DNA sample.  Defendant may request expungement of the DNA sample under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4) by petitioning the Wisconsin Department of Justice. Expungement of DNA is NOT a court process. 
For information see: http://www.doj.state.wi.us/dles/crime-labs/clb-forms.
Defendant has 60 days to follow up with sentence credit.
May not possess or use firearms.

supervisions.notes:
Check in with Probation by 4pm tomorrow (03/04/2015).  
30 days sentence credit if revoked.

miscConds.notes: Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.

Follow through with Compas Evaluation.
Must provide DNA sample - No Surcharge.

supervisions.notes: Subject to Good Time & Work Release = TIME SERVED

Subject to Good Time & Work Release = TIME SERVED
